mapper.select: select r.reply_no as reply_no ,r.store_no as store_no ,r.user_email as user_email ,r.reply_contents as reply_contents ,r.reply_star as reply_star ,to_char(r.reply_indate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as reply_indate ,u.user_name as user_name from insta_replys r, users u where r.user_email = u.user_email and r.store_no = #{store_no}
